channel.title: Tech9320 | Idea -> Reality
channel.description: Recent content on Tech9320 | Idea -> Reality

item.title: It's alive!
item.description: With this post, we officially open the website of our freelancing team - Tech9320. The idea was simmering for several years, but it came to life only in the middle of 2022.

item.title: Web Applications
item.description: Web applications represent user interaction with the product, creating on the one hand values for the company and on the other hand satisfaction of the user with the provided service.

item.title: Websites
item.description: Websites are something that differentiates a company or individual from the rest of the competition. Technology is advancing, and the tools used to reach new clients are changing, but despite all of that, websites still remain one of the most important presentational tools.

item.title: Desktop Applications
item.description: In the time when internet is widespread, developing a desktop application may sound like a total waste of time, right? On the contrary, the need for this type of application is still large - most of the companies with closed/private systems are still in massive demand for applications that are in no way exposed to the internet.

item.title: Mobile Applications
item.description: At the times when smartphones are becoming an indispensable part of our everyday life, making software product in a form of mobile application is necessity for establishing huge userbase.

item.title: Other Services
item.description: If you feel like your requirements falls out of the scope of services we provide, feel free to contact us for consultation. Besides web, mobile and desktop apps we are developing more specific software solutions.
